name: test-package
description: A short description of your package

scripts.docs-bg: if [ -e docsify.pid ]; then echo 'ERROR: docsify pid file exists, kill process and remove file to start'; else docsify serve $npm_package_config_docs_dir > docsify.log & echo $! > docsify.pid; fi
scripts.stop-docs: if [ -e docsify.pid ]; then kill -9 `less docsify.pid`; rm docsify.pid; else echo 'ERROR: pid file not found'; fi
